name: The Lonely Tapes
description:
Arrow keys - move. Slam into things to talk or pick them up.

You are a JogDawg, a portable cassette player! You love to share music with your friends but you've lost all your tapes! Now you need to find the tapes and share them with the new friends you'll find.

I checked out the bitsy editor and thought it was really cool. I was inspired to make an Atari Adventure style game involving music. And here we are!

Get the soundtrack here:  https://jthomeslice.bandcamp.com/track/the-lonely-theme
